imdb.title: Ookamisan to shichinin no nakamatachi
imdb.plot: Ryoko-san and her friends at the Otogi Bank help classmates with their problems, in exchange for their help later on.

episodes.title: Ookami-san and Friends in Otogi Bank
episodes.plot: Ryoko and her friends form Otogi Bank: a social club which specializes in resolving problems for classmates via aggressive transactions. The wallflower Ryoshi is smitten with Ryoko - despite rejection - and must prove his worth to the rest of the troop.

episodes.title: The Lying Ookami-san and Ryoushi-kun
episodes.plot: A mysterious girl asks Ryoko for protection from an aggressive ex-boyfriend. Ryoshi proves himself to the group when Ryoko and the members of Otogi Bank are threatened by the violent Onigashima gang. Ryoko shows a more sensitive side.

episodes.title: Ookami-san Tangled in the Ugly Battle Between the Tortoise and the Hare
episodes.plot: Otohime plans to settle the score with a long-time rival by beating her in the Miss Otogi Academy beauty pageant. At her request, the Otogi Bank unleashes on the competition to help her win at all costs.

episodes.title: Ookami-san and Otsuu-senpai Who Returns a Favor
episodes.plot: Ryoshi saves Otsuu, the maid of Otogi Bank, from a whack from a loose baseball. Obsessed with repaying favors, Otsuu starts doing housework at Ryoshi's place to show her appreciation. Her friends take it upon themselves to break her fixation for good.

episodes.title: Ookami-san Goes Oni-Slaying with Momo-chan-senpai
episodes.plot: In Japanese folklore, Oni are evil creatures such as demons, ogres, and trolls. When the Oni (delinquents) at Onigashima High get unruly, Momo hires Otogi Bank to address the issue with the student council president.

episodes.title: Ookami-san and Little Red Riding Hood, Oh, and Ryoushi-kun
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Ookami-san Goes on a Double Date with Jizou-san
episodes.plot: Ringo arranges a precocious pairing in response to a request from the Academy's baseball whiz. When Ryoko flees the mission, a blow to the head leads to a run-in with the tormentor from her past.

episodes.title: Okami-san and the Mouse Bride Search, and This Is How Pigs Should Be Treated
episodes.plot: Searching for a wife for a wealthy eleven year old turns out to be no small task for the Otogi Bank. The Academy's entire female student body is left scathed by insults from the boy's choosy butler.

episodes.title: Okami-san and a Snow White that the Poisoned Apple Didn't Work On
episodes.plot: Ringo dodges a request from senior and beauty pageant winner, Himeno. Their unfortunate past has Ringo in a fuss. Until she can face the upperclassman, the rest of Otogi Bank must entertain Himeno's seven tyke siblings!

episodes.title: Okami-san and the Otogi Bank's Longest Day
episodes.plot: Someone is conspiring to sabotage Otogi Bank! As Ryoko and company work overtime to fill a flood of requests, thugs from Onigashima High set up full-scale abductions of each Otogi Bank member.

episodes.title: Okami-san and the Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
episodes.plot: Ryoko is back in the clutches of the insufferable bully, Shiro. An Otogi vs Onigashima battle ensues as her friends storm the school to save her. A showdown with Shiro puts Ryoshi - and his recent training - to the test.

episodes.title: Okami-san and a Girl that Didn't Sell Matches but was Poor Anyway
episodes.plot: Machiko, a poor girl who mistakenly sees Ryoshi as her ticket to riches, does her best to pocket him in hopes of marriage. When an underlying dilemma comes to light, the Otogi Bank offers a helping hand - or Neko glove.
